img_above_text:
![Wukong PurpleCloud 38.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8c/Wukong_PurpleCloud_38.jpg)
Be sure to check the shacks on the right for a narrow bridge lined with green Wisps you can cross, and on the other side you'll find a **Treasure Chest** in an open building, and a pathway leading up to that other end of the hamlet.
img_below_text:
Return back across the bridge first, and make your way through the overgrown path to cross a bridge.
![Wukong PurpleCloud 40.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_PurpleCloud_40.jpg)

![Wukong PurpleCloud 40.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/45/Wukong_PurpleCloud_40.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character exploring a forested area with autumn foliage. The character is equipped with a weapon and is positioned near a rocky path surrounded by trees and grass. The preceding text suggests this area is part of a hamlet exploration, where players can find a narrow bridge with green Wisps leading to a treasure chest and a pathway. The following text indicates the player will soon return across the bridge to continue through an overgrown path. The HUD displays abilities, inventory, and "Will" resources, indicating active gameplay.
